DOC.brief_summary: Forty physically active men woman age 18-45y take part 8-week resistance training program , randomize ( double blind ) 1:1 two group . Twenty participant randomize receive 60 g/d hemp powder ( contain approximately 40 g protein 9 g oil ) supplementation 20 randomize receive 60 g/d soy supplementation ( match hemp macronutrients calorie ) eight week train . Each participant complete test intervention assessment body composition ( lean tissue , fat , bone mass ) , strength , central fatigue , marker inflammation , bone resorption . Over 8-weeks training , participant train four-five day per week 1-1.5 hour per session exercise target major muscle group . The training involve `` two day split '' different muscle group train two consecutive day ( day 1 involve chest , back , arm ; day 2 leg , shoulder , abdominal ) . Resistance train provide necessary stimulus protein synthesis optimize effect protein-containing nutritional supplement . The hemp soy powder consume two dos ( i.e . 30 g powder contain 20 g protein per dose ) immediately exercise session one hour exercise . This dose regimen optimal stimulating muscle protein synthesis build muscle mass . On one non-training day per week two dos consume meal .
DOC.brief_title: The Benefits Hemp Protein Supplementation During Resistance Training
